page.title: 13CIRENCESTER LIBRARY
page.content: This library is the only one in Cirencester. It is a friendly, peaceful and quiet place. Most people like to read fiction. There is mostly fiction books in the library. There is a childrens library upstairs and less books are up there. There are 3,000 books altogether. They have films for children and puppet shows and stories. You cannot bring dogs inside. If you get a ticket you can also borrow cassettes and videos.People go there in their spare time to read, especially during the Winter. We met Mrs Thompson, the librarian, who said that the books cost between Â£10 and Â£100. Two and a half people work in the library and 2,600 children and 9,000 adults have joined. The library also keeps newspapers and local information that people might need.
